oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Aerial View of Housing Projects in Edgehill, 1965
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial photograph of the I.W. Gernert Homes and the Edgehill Homes, located on either side of 12th Avenue South, January 1965. Photographed by Bill Driver of the Nashville Housing Authority. Forms part of the MDHA Photograph Collection. 1 photograph : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Nashville Housing Authority (Nashville, Tenn.);
